  16. (* Parsing of modifier (response) files created by hooks and scripts *)

  18. open Ocamltest_stdlib

  20. ‌let modifier_of_string str =
  21.   let lexbuf = Lexing.from_string str in
  22.   let variable_name, result = Tsl_lexer.modifier lexbuf in
  23.   let variable =
  24.     match Variables.find_variable variable_name with
  25.     | None -> raise (Variables.No_such_variable variable_name)
  26.     | Some variable -> variable
  27.   in
  28.   match result with
  29.   | `Remove -> Environments.Remove variable
  30.   | `Add value -> Environments.Add (variable, value)
  31.   | `Append value -> Environments.Append (variable, value)

  33. ‌let modifiers_of_file filename =
  34.   let ic = open_in filename in
  35.   let rec modifiers_of_lines acc = match input_line_opt ic with
  36.     | None -> acc
  37.     | Some line ->
  38.       modifiers_of_lines ((modifier_of_string (String.trim line)) :: acc) in
  39.   let modifiers = modifiers_of_lines [] in
  40.   close_in ic;
  41.   List.rev modifiers
